attributes.action: give the Kennel Club statutory powers for the health, safety and welfare of breeding dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned demand that the goverment provide statutory powers to the Kennel Club {via the Accredited Breeder Scheme } for the safety health and welfare of all breeding dogs, bitches and puppies, to abolish the trade in puppy farming and the sale of puppies from retail outlets in the United Kingdom,

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give the Kennel Club statutory powers for the health, safety and welfare of breeding dogs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18774


Prime Minister's Office
